Address.value: NO. 900 WANGJIANG WEST ROAD,BUILDING B2, ZHONG'AN CHUANGGU TECHNOLOGY PARK, HEFEI, 230088, China

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Zepp Health Corp is engaged in the business of manufacturing smart health wearable products. The company operates in two segments: Xiaomi Wearable Products and Self-branded products & others. The product portfolio includes smartwatches and fitness bands.
